snippet: Volkswagen is working with the United Automobile Workers at its Chattanooga plant on how to unionize the plant and create a German-style works council there, the president of the labor union said.
abstract: Volkswagen is working with United Automobile Workers in Chattanooga, Tenn, assembly plant on how to unionize and create German-style works council; company would be first German automaker to have work council at United States plant, where workers would meet with management on issues like working conditions and productivity.
lead_paragraph: Volkswagen is working with the United Automobile Workers at its Chattanooga plant on how to unionize the plant and create a German-style works council there, the president of the labor union said.

headline.main: VW and Its Workers Explore a Union at a Tennessee Plant
headline.print_headline: VW and Its Workers Explore A Union at a Tennessee Plant
